entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 08 January 2023
